visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include monthly rainfall data for a year. Custom colors should be used for the series, and additional configurations should include chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart includes a styled x-axis with month categories and a y-axis labeled 'Rainfall (mm)'. Both axes have labels with a specific color and font size. The data series represents monthly rainfall data with a custom color. Additional configurations include a light gray background, custom margins for better spacing, and a legend with styled text. This setup ensures a visually appealing and informative chart.
